body:
Comment 1: 
Feel free.  You'll have to add them in 8l first
(in particular 8.out.h) and then in 8a.  It would
be good to change both 8c and 8g to use them.
Assuming Pentium Pro seems fine.

I've been on the fence about whether to assume
Pentium 4 and just use SSE2 like the amd64 tools do.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **HelpWanted**._
